ABOUT US
Synthcore is a digital marketing agency that specializes in helping businesses boost
their online presence. We focus on growing followers and increasing views on
platforms like Instagram to improve brand visibility and engagement. In addition to
our marketing services, we provide a proprietary CRM software designed to help
you manage customer relationships and streamline your sales and marketing
efforts. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive solution that helps you not only
attract new customers but also build lasting relationships with them.

AGREEMENT &
POLICIES
Service  Agreement:  This  outlines  the  scope  of  work,  deliverables,  timelines,  and
payment terms for social media management and CRM automation services.
Privacy  Policy:  This  details  how  client  data  is  collected,  used,  and  protected,
ensuring compliance with relevant regulations.
Terms  of  Service:  This  covers  intellectual  property  rights,  confidentiality
obligations, and termination clauses for both parties involved.
.
Performance-Based Bonuses: Incentives may be offered for exceeding pre-defined
goals, such as follower growth or lead generation.
Project-Based Fees: For specific, one-time projects outside the monthly scope, a
separate fee will be negotiated and agreed upon.
This agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days' written notice.
Upon termination, service access will cease, and data handling will follow contract terms.
Outstanding fees/deliverables will be settled before final termination.
Client data is protect with Google password Technologies shared for CRM and social media
services will be kept strictly confidential.
We employ robust security measures and adhere to privacy best practices to protect your
information.
Your data will only be used for the agreed-upon services and never shared without your
consent.
SERVICES
COMPENSATION

OUR PROMISES

overwhelming them.
Yes, we offer  30,000  Free campaing For our Client To Ge The Result In 3 to 6 Month , after 6
Moths Paid Ads Will charge Extar as Your Goals 
Results  can  vary  based  on  factors  like  your  industry,  goals,  and  current  online  presence.
Generally,  you  might  start  seeing  some  engagement  and  growth  within  a  few  months,  but
significant results often take several months to a year for Organic  Content Creation 
We are strictly active during standard working hours from 11 AM to 6 PM. However, if there are
urgent meetings, it can be arranged.
The  agency  will  track  key  performance  indicators  (KPIs)  such  as  engagement  metrics  (likes,
shares, comments), reach, follower growth, website traffic, conversion rates, and more.
